thread.title: Indonesia declines Singapore’s assistance to fight fires, says it has enough resources – 2 Oct 2015
thread.title_full: Indonesia declines Singapore’s assistance to fight fires, says it has enough resources – 2 Oct 2015

author: centennial
title: Indonesia declines Singapore’s assistance to fight fires, says it has enough resources – 2 Oct 2015
text: Home › The Asian Pulse › Daily News › Indonesia declines Singapore’s assistance to fight fires, says it has enough resources - 2 Oct 2015 Indonesia declines Singapore’s assistance to fight fires, says it has enough resources – 2 Oct 2015 Friday, October 2nd, 2015 Indonesia has enough resources to fight the forest fires that are causing the haze in the region, and does not need the assistance offered by Singapore at this time, Indonesian officials told a Singapore delegation on 1 Oct. The meeting also discussed law enforcement against errant companies; Singapore also explained how its Transboundary Haze Pollution Act allows it to take legal action against offenders, and this can “supplement Indonesia’s actions while respecting Indonesia’s sovereignty”.
